title: "How is AI moving finance forward?"
excerpt: "Since the public launch of ChatGPT in November 2022, many people have become aware of AI's ability to augment their skills in a wide variety of activities, including finance. This has been made possible thanks to breakthroughs in computing power, unlocking the ability to train ML using large volumes of quality data."
